postApp.tests module

postApp.urls module

postApp.views module

postApp.views.create_post(request)[source]

Create a new post if entered userId exists in external API user endpoint.

postApp.views.post_detail(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Retrieve, update or delete a post. If post with selected id doesn’t exist, try to get post from external API.

postApp.views.post_list(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]

List all posts, or create a new post.

postApp.views.posts_by_user(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Retrieve, delete all posts of chosen user or create a new one.
